data.reason: No candidate meets TIER 1 criteria. All coins show RSI >60 (TIER 2 territory) with gains >5%, matching LOST trade patterns (TRUST, ASTER, SUPER all failed with RSI 50-60 + high gains). Patience required—wait for RSI 50-60 range with MACD Line > Signal Line crossover.
